document.full_text: the inaugural o music awards -- the new anti-awards show that celebrates the growing power of digital music -- will be hosted in las vegas next week, organizers mtv music group said on wednesday.
document.title: flash mobs, rapping record mark first o music awards
lines_and_colors: the inaugural o music awards -- the new anti-awards show that celebrates the growing power of digital music -- will be hosted in las vegas next week, organizers mtv music group said on wednesday.
